response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $12,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a special price of $11,000. This offer is tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment to quality. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 11000}
